Author: PMmeUrReasons4Living
Text: I know it might feel counter-intuitive , but digesting itself takes a lot of energy so there's often a feeling of fatigue with eating ESPECIALLY after restricting. The best thing you can do is, you know... Upping the intake. (I'm sorry, I know that's really hard to battle with.)  &#x200B;   Maybe trying to spend calories on things with lots of protein, or electrolytes, to help support your systems energy.
